"}]}]}]}], "detailedDescription_md": "The scheme \u201cChief Minister\u2019s Yuva Kaushal Yojana (CM YKY)\u201d has been launched in the state of Arunachal Pradesh with effect from 1 April 2018 to provide high-end training to youth across the country. The programme is fully funded under the state plan with a specific focus on providing job linked high end training programme to the youth. The objective of the scheme is to provide high-end training to the youth across the state to enable them to find jobs in the private sector.
